name: Smartwool Anchor Line Socks - Unisex
description: Socks that stay in place, where ever you go. The merino blend naturally regulates temperature and lets your feet breathe.Merino, nylon and spandex wicks sweat and manages temperature to keep you cool in the summer yet warm in the winter.Virtually Seamless™ toe eliminates chafing and hot spots.Arch brace hugs the foot for a snug and supportive fit.Mesh ventilation zones keep feet cool and comfortable.
